page.title: 09MAXAM CO. CAMBORNE
page.content: {Maxam is a large company}situated at {Tuckingmill.}They employ about{120 men in the factory and{210 men}doing other jobs, also taking on school leavers on Y.T.S. They produce pneumatic equipment, mainly valves, cylinders & switches. On average{500,000}are produced per year.The equipment is made mainly from aluminium, brass & plastic.Large stocks of goods are always kept in store, so that there is always equipment to be sold.{40%}of these are {exported,}mainly to Europe.The remaining{60% is sold in Britain. During the war 600 men & women worked at the firm on a 3 shift system, producing ammunition.Since then Maxam has merged & changed hands being called{Maxam Power}&{Compair {Maxam}but today is known as{Maxam.
